title: Garlic Tomato Beef with Potato and Carrot Mash

ingredients.content: 700 g floury potatoes, peeled, diced (1.5 cm)
300 g carrots, cut in pieces (1.5 cm)
800 g beef meat, sinew free, diced (2.5 cm)
fresh parsley leaves, roughly chopped, for garnishing

preparations.content: Place Varoma dish into position and weigh in potatoes. Insert Varoma tray then weigh on carrots. Set Varoma aside.
Place garlic, onions and 30 g oil in mixing bowl then chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>.
Add tomatoes and bay leaf then sauté <b>5 min/120°C/speed 1<b>.
Add beef, wine, water, beef stock and pepper then cook <b>10 min/Varoma//speed 1<b>.
Place covered Varoma into position then cook <b>20 min/Varoma//speed 1<b>. Set Varoma aside. Transfer beef stew to a serving bowl and cover to keep warm. Clean mixing bowl.
Place steamed carrots in mixing bowl and mash <b>3 sec/speed 4<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.

Place steamed potatoes, remaining 10 g oil, milk, salt and nutmeg in mixing bowl then mash <b>40 sec/speed 3<b>. Transfer to bowl with carrots and mix well with spatula. Garnish beef stew with parsley and serve hot with mash.

hintsAndTricks: Potato and carrot mash can be frozen in small batches.
Drizzle <b>1 Tbsp<b> extra virgin olive oil over mashed potatoes for extra flavour.
